name: Goldify
description:
This Game was made for the MINI JAM 85

https://itch.io/jam/mini-jam-85-gold

please leave your thoughts, I'd really appreciate

Update:

Press I to invert the camera, ESC to pause and  BACKSPACE to quit

The logic:

Move to one side of the wall and take one of them out and by then, the other turret is almost fully at you and then you just move to the other side and take it out too before it gets to you.

Saves you time and health to beat the ending. Have fun playing.
